verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: he will meet with North Korea 's Kim Jong in Singapore on June 12] .
President Donald Trump says he [V: will] meet with North Korea 's Kim Jong in Singapore on June 12 .
President Donald Trump says [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARG1: with North Korea 's Kim Jong] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: on June 12] .
